import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { OfferView } from "../catalog/OfferView"; import OfferService from "../../services/offer.service"; export const Search = () => { const [offers, setOffers] = useState([]); const onSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target.value); const { model, vehicleIdentificationNumber } = Object.fromEntries(formData); const searchData = { model, vehicleIdentificationNumber }; console.log(searchData); OfferService.searchOffer(searchData).then((offer) => setOffers(offer.data)); }; return (
An Easier way to find your Housing
  • Rural
  • Urban
  • All
{offers.map((offer) => ( ))}
); };
